snippet.title: PAGER - A 1-bit 3D Kafkaesque horror in a 90s office building!
snippet.description:
Play the demo on itch.io https://bilgetbd.itch.io/pager?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt PAGER is a 1-bit 3D Kafkaesque horror game set in a 90s office building.
It’s your first day at work, and to succeed, you must follow the pager’s instructions carefully.

➡️ More from bilge https://bilgetbd.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More 1-bit games https://itch.io/games/tag-1-bit?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
